pageTitle: Meeting rooms Chandigarh Panchkula | Golden Tulip Chandigarh Panchkula
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {1666=The Golden Tulip Chandigarh Panchkula is a tranquil and stunning venue from which to host a range of events. Whether you are planning a wedding or a business conference, we have the space to suit you. Our Great Hall can accommodate 600 people, or up to 1000 when combined with our beautiful outdoor spaces. The Great Hall or Imperial Ballroom is an ideal location to hold weddings, glamorous parties and banquets. The smaller Summit Hall can hold up to 175 people and is perfect for seminars and workshops as it has all the modern conference technology to help your event run smoothly.}
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {13357=Imperial ballroom offers an ideal venue for hosting gala dinner, events, meetings or social functions for up to 500 guest in the hall and can accommodate 1000 guests, when clubbed with the resort's lush green, well manicured lawn.}
